environment_overview:
1) Two TVs have been detected: the Samsung The Frame (49) and the Samsung 8 Series (82). The Samsung The Frame (49) is equipped with capabilities such as switching, audio volume control, audio mute, and TV channel management. It supports multiple input sources, including digital TV and HDMI ports. The Samsung 8 Series (82) also has similar capabilities but is limited to digital TV as its input source.

2) The current state of the Samsung The Frame (49) is powered on, while the Samsung 8 Series (82) is powered off. Actionable controls for the Samsung The Frame (49) include switching (already on), adjusting audio volume, muting audio, and managing playback commands. For the Samsung 8 Series (82), the switch capability can be utilized to turn it on, as it is currently off.
